Journals by discipline

May opening hours: There will be some changes to our regular opening hours during the month of May to facilitate exam preparation. See here for full details.

New Library Resources: The library has subscribed to two new resources which students and staff may find useful, Bloomsbury Professional Online, which has been added to our list of databases following a trial period last month, and the ProQuest Mental Health and Wellbeing eBook collection. For full details including descriptions of these resources and instructions for how to access them, see here .

Opening Hours Update: Until further notice, the library will be open from 8am to 10pm Monday - Friday, and 10am - 5pm on Saturdays. For full details see here .

Spencer Dock Study Rooms: The library has 8dedicated rooms for group study and there are also anadditional two rooms on the 1st floor of the Spencer Dock building which may be booked for group study,for more information andto book these rooms, click here .

Printing Outside Library Opening Hours: See our FAQ on how to print outside of the library here .

NCI library is locatedon the 4th and 5th floors of the Spencer Dock campus.We look forward to welcoming new and returningstudents and staff in the new semester!You can contact the librarythrough the LibChat icon on the bottom right of the page.

Library FAQs and Updates

0 options available. Use up and down arrows to browse available options and enter to select one.
  • May opening hours This link opens in a new window The library opening hours during May 2025 are as follows: Thursday May 1st &amp;Friday May 2nd: 8am - 10pm (4th floor 8am - 8pm) Saturday May 3rd - MondayMay 5th: 10am - 5pm Tuesday May 6th - Friday May 9th: 8am - 10pm (4th floor 8am - 8pm) Saturday May 10th &amp;Sunday May 11th: 10am - 5pm Monday May 12th - Friday May 16th: 8am - 10pm (4th floor 8am - 8pm) Saturday May 17th &amp;Sunday May 18th: 10am - 5pm Monday May 19th - Friday May 23rd: 8am - 10pm (4th floor 8am - 8pm) Saturday May 24th: 10am - 5pm Sunday May 25th: CLOSED Monday May 26th - Thursday May 29th: 8am - 10pm (4th floor 8am - 8pm) Friday May 30th: 8am-6pm Saturday May 31st - Monday June 2nd:CLOSED LibChat will be available 9am - 7:30pm on all days the library is open, with the exception of those days when the library closes at 5pm or 6pm (in this case, LibChat will cease operation a half hour before closing time). See here for full opening hours, and remember that our online resources are available 24/7. Best of luck with exams! Apr 11, 2025
  • New Library databases This link opens in a new window The library has subscribed to some new databases/collections which students and staff may find useful: The first is Bloomsbury Professional Online, covering Irish legal subjects such as taxation, commercialand employment law.Following our trial period last month, this has now been added to our list of library databases.We have subscriptions to the following three eBook collections through this database: Irish employment law Irish intellectual property and IT law Irish company and commercial law. To log in to this database, please select Sign in to your personal account, then choose Login with Institutional access, and then type in National College of Ireland. This will allow you to log in with either your student or staff email address. For more information on how to use this database, please see here. The secondis the ProQuest Mental Health and Wellbeing Collection, containing over 4,800 eBookscovering key topics related to the study of psychology (Social Psychology, Clinical Psychology, Psychotherapy, Neuropsychology) and student wellbeing (Stress Management, Meditation, Emotions, Personal Growth). This collection can be accessed via ProQuest Ebook Central's Advanced Search function, where under "Collection", the "Mental Health &amp; Wellbeing Ebook Subscription" can be selected. More information about this collection may be found here. Make sure to keep an eye on our A-Z Databases webpage for information about the full range of databases you have access to as an NCI student or staff member. Happy reading! Jan 27, 2025
  • Changes to Past Exam Papers Database This link opens in a new window For the month of January 2025, NCI past exam papers may be accessed via a Sharepoint site at the following link:https://studentncirl.sharepoint.com/sites/ExamPapersArchive/Past%20exam%20papers/Forms/AllItems.aspx Students and staff will need to log in to access these papers, and the login info will match your NCI Single Sign-On credentials. Get in touch with any questions, and best of luck with the exams! Jan 2, 2025
